feed.title: Wishlist Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.39.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow inviting users via links when smtp enabled by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/229
  • Fix password reset form by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/232
  • Add basic bookmarklet support by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/230

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.38.3...v0.39.0

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.40.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adjust language around deleting groups or removing members from groups by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/249
  • Fix create registry item by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/253

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.40.0...v0.40.1

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.41.0
entry.content:
New Features

Now any list can be made public without have to be a Registry! This is configurable per group and is off by default. To allow lists to be public, you can enable public lists in your group and set a specific list to be public from the list "Manage" page.

What's Changed

  • Add norwegian language by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/256
  • fix: Unable to clear claimed items by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/258
  • Allow all lists to be public by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/259
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/257

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.40.1...v0.41.0
